structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents
Arms, Great Seal And Other Emblems Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Memorial Of Commonwealth To Honor Vietnam War Veterans Of Commonwealth
law.text: The memorial to be constructed and maintained in the city of Worcester at Green Hill Park by the department of veterans’ services and the city of Worcester in cooperation with The Commonwealth of Massachusetts Vietnam Veterans’ Memorial Trust, Incorporated shall be the official memorial of the commonwealth to honor the Vietnam veterans of the commonwealth.
